description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Minions! is a mission-based shooter that can be played from both top-down and third-person perspectives.  You create a hero, accompanied by a wide range of different minions to help you complete each mission.  As the challenges get tougher, your hero will unlock points to spend on upgrades and customized minions.
description.short: Minions! is a mission-based shooter that can be played from both top-down and third-person perspectives.  You create a hero, accompanied by a wide range of different minions to help you complete each mission.  As the challenges get tougher, your hero will unlock points to spend on upgrades and customized minions.
